cyclone.name: ELSA
cyclone.current_location: about 65 miles W of Cabo Cruz, Cuba and 100 miles S of Camagüey, Cuba
cyclone.trajectory: moving northwest across central/western Cuba, then turning north-northwest toward the Florida Straits, Florida Keys, and the west coast of Florida

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Cuba, Jamaica, Florida Keys, and the west coast of Florida (not the U.S. Virgin Islands)
weather_observation.wind: No significant tropical-storm-force winds expected at St. Croix during the next 5 days
weather_observation.rainfall: Only occasional showers; heavy rainfall threat has shifted well west of the Virgin Islands
